title: 820-3209 not backlight
message:
test good screen persist problem, any history avalaible?corrotion u9701 and short C9710, change u9701 and C9710; persist problem

PPBUS_S0_LCDBKLT_FUSED=8.4V
PPBUS_SW_LCDBKLT_PWR=8.4
D9701=8.4, 8.37  BOTH SIDES
BKL_EN=2.7V
BKL_PWM=3.3V

title: 820-3209 not backlight
message:
Check traces from U9701 to D9701.
Also check all return resistors, R9717-22.
